## How to customise reports on dashboard?

Curricula provides several dashboard reports. Alex is the LMS admin in an
organisation and he has been assigned as the application admin of Curricula.
He wants to customise these reports. Now let’s see how Alex can customise
reports and lay out the dashboard.

1\. In Curricula, Alex clicks **Report** on the left navigation panel.

2\. The dashboard report data is automatically updated per hour. John can find
the last updated time of the dashboard report data. When the next update time
arrives, John refreshes the page to ensure that all report data is up to date.

3\. John locates the report that he wants to customise, and then clicks the
Edit button. He updates the widget name, description, chart type, and other
information, and then previews the report before submitting these changes.

4\. To change the dashboard layout, John clicks the Edit button, and then
drags and drops each report to change its location.
